attributes.additional_details:
Since the Brexit vote parliament has voted to deliver article 50 but wasted three years pointlessly debating and delaying delivery of the result.
Parliamentarians have shown themselves incapable of delivering any results but seem to be leaning toward reversing the decision by any means.
They have now crippled the sitting Government and are working to their own agenda this need rectifying by means of a General Election.

No waiting is acceptable it should be called immediately.
attributes.background:
Giving the behaviour of all parties and MPs over the past three years, Parliament has shown itself incapable of conducting itself in a fit and proper manner.
MPs have stood on manifestos they have since ignored, this must end we demand a General election,
